notes.title: Notes
notes.p: Disclaimer. The views expressed in this manuscript are not necessarily those of the Department of Health, England.

Financial support. This work was supported by an award from the Wellcome Trust (to C. M. T.’s laboratory). The quarantine challenge study was supported by a Cooperative Grant from US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (grant number 1U01P000497-01).

Potential conflicts of interest. All authors: No reported conflicts. All authors have submitted the ICMJE Form for Disclosure of Potential Conflicts of Interest. J. S. N.-V.-T. is currently on secondment to the Department of Health, England. Conflicts that the editors consider relevant to the content of the manuscript have been disclosed.
